carrier_master.ownership_note: Smith family. Largest privately held transportation company.
carrier_master.primary_mode_note: CRST pioneered team driving — two drivers per truck, running 24/7 coast-to-coast
carrier_master.carlisle_pa_connection: CRST has a diesel mechanic shop in Carlisle, PA. LHS has a Phase 1 hub planned for Carlisle, PA.
carrier_master.fit_rationale: Privately held = fast decisions. Team driving = highest on-road time. Gold Rules culture = receptive. Carlisle PA shop = direct geographic match. 7 C-suite contacts = best access of any prospect. Better than Covenant/Heartland on every dimension except fleet size.
carrier_master.primary_pitch_angle: Your team drivers already stop in Carlisle PA — now there's a private terminal waiting
carrier_master.secondary_pitch_angle: You launched Gold Rules in 2014. We built the physical expression of it.
carrier_master.recommended_entry_persona: Larry Barnes (SVP Strategy, Birmingham AL) or Jenny Abernathy (CPO)

outreach_paths.bold: Email Mike Gannon (CEO) — new, needs visible wins
outreach_paths.strategic: Email Larry Barnes (SVP Strategy, Birmingham AL) — title matches, Southeast location
outreach_paths.culture: Email Jenny Abernathy (CPO) — Gold Rules alignment

carrier_master.exec_summary: CRST is one of America's largest privately held carriers: $1.5B revenue, 4,500 trucks, 7,300 trailers, 6,000+ drivers. Team driving pioneers. Family-owned (Smith family). New CEO Mike Gannon. Gold Rules driver culture since 2014. Carlisle PA mechanic shop = Phase 1 hub geographic match. 7 C-suite contacts. Best large-carrier prospect in pipeline.

carrier_contacts.title: CEO / Group President
carrier_contacts.notes: Recently appointed CEO. New, needs visible wins.

carrier_contacts.title: CEO
carrier_contacts.notes: May be subsidiary or former CEO.

carrier_contacts.title: Chief People Officer
carrier_contacts.notes: KEY — Gold Rules champion. Quoted in press about driver-first culture.

carrier_contacts.title: SVP Strategy & Market Development
carrier_contacts.notes: RECOMMENDED ENTRY. Title matches. Southeast location. Closest to LHS territory.
